name: A Passing Tale
description: Maralize van der Westhuizen is a simple woman who comes from a wealthy family. Her father love to explore and constantly invited Maralize along, eventually she became very experienced at their explorations but unfortunately her father fell ill and passed on. When she was cleaning out her fathers office she found his notebook with all of his adventures. And a lost of all the places he wanted to go, he was able to go everywhere except the Drakensburg mountains. She decided she would spread her fathers ashes at his final adventure destination. After she spread the ashes she fell through a sinkhole into a cave and must now find a way out before it's too late.
